column4: ['1 can (14 oz.) kidney beans', '1 can (14 oz.) green beans', '1 can yellow wax beans', '1 cup chopped celery', '1/2 cup chopped green pepper (optional)', '1/2 cup chopped onion', '3/4 cup sugar', '1/2 cup white vinegar', '1/4 cup vegetable oil', '1 tsp. salt']
column5: Drain beans thoroughly. Combine beans, celery, onion and green pepper. Shake together sugar, vinegar, oil, and salt. Pour over vegetables and chill several hours or overnight. Drain before serving.

column4: ['1 can sweetened condensed milk', '2 packages of white chocolate chips', '16 Oreo cookies (crushed up)']
column5: Put condensed milk and chocolate chips in a bowl. Melt in microwave for 1 minute. Stir and put back into the microwave for 15 seconds and then stir again. Keep doing this until all chips are melted and mixture is smooth but DON'T OVERCOOK (no more than 2 minutes total). Add the crushed Oreos (keep a little to sprinkle on top). Poor the mixture into a square pan lined with parchment paper. Sprinkle remaining cookie crumbs on top and pat them down. Allow to harden in fridge to cut into squares.

column4: ['2 tsp. soya sauce', '1/2 cup water', '1 onion (small and diced)', '2 lbs fresh ribs', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1 tsp. garlic', '2 tbsp. honey']
column5: Boil ribs for 45 minutes. Mix all ingredients together in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Pour over ribs and bake covered for 30 minutes and uncovered for 30 minutes at 350 degrees Fahrenheit (watch uncovered for burning). Add pineapple cubes if desired. Double mixture if you want juicier ribs.

column4: ['18 large whole mushrooms', '1 small onion', '2 slices of ham coarsely crumbled', '1/4 cup fine bread crumbs', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese ', '2 tbsp. vegetable oil', '1/4 lb. ground beef', '1/3 cup dry sherry or red wine', '1 tsp. garlic powder', '1/2 tsp. pepper']
column5: Carefully remove stems from mushrooms. Place mushroom caps on cookie sheet. Heat oil in a large skillet on moderate hear. Cook onion and beef until browned. Add chopped stems, ham and sherry and cook for 5 minutes. Add bread crumbs, garlic powder, salt and pepper and mix well. Stuff mixture into caps and sprinkle with cheese. Broil mushrooms under broiler 3 inches from source of heat for 2-5 minutes. Serve hot.
